issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: SPNEGO to Web UI fails with headers larger than 4KB

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{code}
curl -k  -vvv -i -L --negotiate -u : https://<servername>:50070

< HTTP/1.1 413 FULL head
HTTP/1.1 413 FULL head
< Connection: close
Connection: close
< Server: Jetty(6.1.26)
Server: Jetty(6.1.26)
{code}

For some users, the spnego token too large for the default header buffer used by Jetty. 

Though the issue is fixed for HTTP connections (via HADOOP-8816), HTTPS connections needs to be fixed as well.
fields.summary: The size of header buffer of HttpServer is too small when HTTPS is enabled

comments.body: Attaching a simple patch which sets the header buffer size to 64KB. The same value is used for http.
